sentences.sContent: Prior to the start of the fight, promoter Tex Rickard visits Dempsey and his manager in his dressing room.
sentences.sCn: 比赛开始前，赞助人特克斯·里卡德在更衣室里拜访了邓普西和他的经理人（卡恩斯）。

sentences.sContent: We had to find a lawyer to help us understand the actions of Dempsey but Blatter came in and said he understood our plight.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须找一个律师来帮助我们理解邓普西的行为，但是布拉特进来说，他理解我们的苦境。

sentences.sContent: Speaking about the conference, Noel Dempsey TD, minister for transport, commented, “It's a proven fact that speed has a direct relationship with collision severity.
sentences.sCn: 在会议上，交通运输部部长诺尔·邓普西指出：“这是一个速度和车祸的严重程度之间有直接关系的事实证明。
